text:
[Verse]
We chase the setting sun
Hearts as one
Feet in the sand
Life's a simple dance

[Verse 2]
Stars above they gleam
Lost in a dream
Moonlight's tender touch
We don't ask for much

[Chorus]
Drifting clouds up high
Paint the sky
Flying oh so free
Just you and me

[Verse 3]
Waves crash soft and low
Whispers we know
In the night we stay
Till the break of day

[Chorus]
Drifting clouds up high
Paint the sky
Flying oh so free
Just you and me

[Bridge]
Time it slips away
Night meets the day
Hold on to this chance
Life's a simple dance
title: Drifting Clouds
